model

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.GameManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameManager
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is the main game manager that controls the whole game
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Amir
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameManager

        public GameManager(int players,
                   java.lang.String strategies,
                   int totalTurns)
        Class constructor. It sets the map and players field then calls initGame that to add Players then allocate default armies to each player then allocate countries randomly to players finally game is started
        Parameters:
        players - number of players
        strategies - is comma separated string with strategies
        totalTurns - is number of turns u want to play expect the InvalidNumOfPlayersException be careful

      • GameManager

        public GameManager(Map m,
                   int players,
                   java.lang.String strategies,
                   int totalTurns)
        Constructor to initialize the game
        Parameters:
        m - is selected map
        players - is number of players
        strategies - is comma separated string with strategies
        totalTurns - is number of turns the has to be played -for tournament

      • GameManager

        public GameManager()
        Empty Constructor to initialize the GameManager in Driver class

    • Method Detail

      • startGame

        public void startGame(int players,
                      java.lang.String strategies)
               throws InvalidNumOfPlayersException
        It sets the map and players field then calls initGame that to add Players then allocate default armies to each player then allocate countries randomly to players finally game is started
        Parameters:
        players - number of players
        strategies - of the players
        Throws:
        InvalidNumOfPlayersException - be careful

      • setStrategies

        public void setStrategies()
        set strategies according to strategies string sample for 3 players with Human, Random and Aggressive strategies is h,r,a

      • start

        public void start(boolean play)
           throws InvalidNumOfPlayersException
        method to start the game
        Parameters:
        play - should they start the game
        Throws:
        InvalidNumOfPlayersException - is not provided as per game rules

      • initGame

        public void initGame()
              throws InvalidNumOfPlayersException
        Initialize the game steps Step 1: Add players and give each them armies according to the rules Step 2: Randomly allocate the countries in the map Step 3: Allocate initial armies according to the rules Step 4: Place armies onto territories in turn
        Throws:
        InvalidNumOfPlayersException - be careful

      • takeNextTurn

        public void takeNextTurn()
        This method moves the player to the next phase whenever it get called If a player finished his 3 phases(reinforcement,attack,fortification) then selects next player

      • domitantionResult

        public void domitantionResult()
        This method calculates the domination of each player and sends it to the Observers

      • play

        public GameResult play(boolean verbos)
        This is the method that handles the game play It does the following steps until any player own entire map
        • Step1: Selects a player in round robin
        • Step2: Gives him reinforcement
        • Step3: And the attack
        • Step4: And then fortification
        • Step5: Check if any player own entire map, if not continue
        Parameters:
        verbos - logging will be done
        Returns:
        the result of the game

      • calculateReinforcementArmies

        public int calculateReinforcementArmies(IPlayer p)
        calculates reinforcement armies for each player
        Parameters:
        p - player
        Returns:
        number or armies the player should get

      • placeArmies

        public void placeArmies(IPlayer p)
        this method helps players to move armies from a territory to another
        Parameters:
        p - player who wants to place armies

      • placeInitialArmies

        public void placeInitialArmies()
        This method automatically place initial armies into territories one by one according to the game rules in the start-up phase
